name: part_010
file: tmp_≪-KAGURA- Dance of the Gods 3D LIVE≫ Hakos Baelz Birthday 2025 + ANNOUNCEMENTS! #BaeDDay2025 [viPlIHvk724]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Hakos Baelz finishes her merchandise announcement and introduces the final song of her birthday live.
Hakos Baelz performs her new original song 'FEAST' (狂宴 -FEAST-).
Hakos Baelz officially announces the new song and its upcoming music video.

subtitles.original: ...もありそうなんで、
subtitles.english: ...is likely,

subtitles.original: ぜひみんな買ってください！はい！
subtitles.english: so please everyone, buy it! Yes!

subtitles.original: というわけで、That is...
subtitles.english: So with that, that is...

subtitles.original: ...my Birthday Celebration 2025 merch! Yay!
subtitles.english: ...my Birthday Celebration 2025 merch! Yay!

subtitles.original: みんなに買ってね。
subtitles.english: Everyone, please buy them.

subtitles.original: お願いします。
subtitles.english: I'm counting on you.

subtitles.original: Now, I said there were two announcements.
subtitles.english: Now, I said there were two announcements.

subtitles.original: That was one.
subtitles.english: That was one.

subtitles.original: I wonder what number two is.
subtitles.english: I wonder what number two is.

subtitles.original: 何でしょう？
subtitles.english: What could it be?

subtitles.original: What is the second announcement?
subtitles.english: What is the second announcement?

subtitles.original: Maybe I can give you a hint, but...
subtitles.english: Maybe I can give you a hint, but...

subtitles.original: ...first, I want you to listen to this last song!
subtitles.english: ...first, I want you to listen to this last song!

subtitles.original: Wild, hammy, Adam, Babel queen.
subtitles.english: Wild, hammy, Adam, Babel queen.

subtitles.original: 狂わす現、証言、生、狂宴。
subtitles.english: Maddening reality, testimony, life, a feast.

subtitles.original:
狂宴 -FEAST- 
 Lyrics, Music, Arrangement: biz, ZERA
subtitles.english:
FEAST 
 Lyrics, Music, Arrangement: biz, ZERA

subtitles.original: Secret それは賞賛の
subtitles.english: Secret, it's a praise,

subtitles.original: Direct サプライズくらい
subtitles.english: a direct surprise.

subtitles.original: お耳はこちら手の鳴る方へ
subtitles.english: Come this way to the ears, where the hands clap.

subtitles.original: もう誰も止められない
subtitles.english: No one can stop it anymore.

subtitles.original: Don't stop, a-bangin', go go.
subtitles.english: Don't stop, a-bangin', go go.

subtitles.original: 獰猛 騒げ 暴動
subtitles.english: Ferocious, make some noise, riot.

subtitles.original: その胸に牙を突き立てて
subtitles.english: Drive your fangs into that chest.

subtitles.original: 愛、再開、鳴らせない鼓動
subtitles.english: Love, reunion, a heartbeat that can't be silenced.

subtitles.original: 飢えた野性 叫ぶ咆哮
subtitles.english: A starving beast, a screaming roar.

subtitles.original: さあ解き放つ衝動
subtitles.english: Now, release the impulse.

subtitles.original: その鼓動が疼き出す
subtitles.english: That heartbeat starts to ache.

subtitles.original: 騒ぐ Blood 反逆 Headshot
subtitles.english: A noisy Blood, a rebellious Headshot.

subtitles.original: 騒々界 誠界 ばらばらに
subtitles.english: The noisy world, the true world, falling apart.

subtitles.original: この胸を焼き上げる 本能的感情
subtitles.english: This chest is burning up. An instinctive emotion.

subtitles.original: 騒々界 冥界 どれあれ
subtitles.english: The noisy world, the underworld, whatever it is.

subtitles.original: 疼く渇望 もう抑えきれない
subtitles.english: A throbbing craving, I can't hold it back anymore.

subtitles.original: 感情を削り落とす 爽快騒鳴界
subtitles.english: Shaving off the emotions. An exhilarating, noisy life world.

subtitles.original: この鼓動が胸を刺すくらい
subtitles.english: To the point where this heartbeat stabs my chest.

subtitles.original: 騒々界 誠界 ばらばらに
subtitles.english: The noisy world, the true world, falling apart.

subtitles.original: 妄想 死の 狂宴
subtitles.english: Delusion, death, a feast.

subtitles.original: さあ ほら 爪を突き刺して
subtitles.english: Come, see, dig your claws in.

subtitles.original: さあ 狂騒に飢えて
subtitles.english: Come, starve in the frenzy.

subtitles.original: Don't stop 狂わせる鼓動
subtitles.english: Don't stop, the heartbeat that drives you crazy.

subtitles.original: 症状は炎上
subtitles.english: The symptoms are on fire.

subtitles.original: 獰猛 騒げ 暴動
subtitles.english: Ferocious, make some noise, riot.

subtitles.original: アバンギャルド 感情

subtitles.original: 喉元に爪を突き立てて
subtitles.english: Drive your claws into the throat.

subtitles.original: 誰にももう 止められない
subtitles.english: No one can stop it anymore.

subtitles.original: 歪む視界 悠延性
subtitles.english: A distorted view, relaxation,

subtitles.original: 怒り荒れ狂う感情
subtitles.english: an anger-crazed emotion.

subtitles.original: もう誰にも 邪魔できない
subtitles.english: No one can interfere anymore.

subtitles.original: Headshot!
subtitles.english: Headshot!

subtitles.original: 騒々界 盛界 ばらばらに
subtitles.english: The noisy world, the prime world, falling apart.

subtitles.original: この胸を 掻き毟る 本能的衝動
subtitles.english: This chest is being torn apart. An instinctive impulse.

subtitles.english: A throbbing craving, I can't hold it back anymore.

subtitles.original: この鼓動が胸を刺すくらい
subtitles.english: To the point where this heartbeat stabs my chest.

subtitles.original: 騒々界 誠界 ばらばらに
subtitles.english: The noisy world, the true world, falling apart.

subtitles.original: 妄想 死の 狂宴
subtitles.english: Delusion, death, a feast.

subtitles.original: むさぼり尽くせ ラブルな魂
subtitles.english: Devour it all, the rubble soul.

subtitles.original: 踊り明かそう さあ さあ さあ
subtitles.english: Let's dance the night away. Come on, come on, come on.

subtitles.original: 狂騒沸き上がる さあ 遊びましょう
subtitles.english: The frenzy is boiling up. Now, let's play.

subtitles.original: Yes she did! Yes she did! Oh!
subtitles.english: Yes she did! Yes she did! Oh!

subtitles.original: That second announcement is a new song!
subtitles.english: That second announcement is a new song!

subtitles.original: 新曲出ます！
subtitles.english: A new song is coming out!

subtitles.original: どうだった？ How was it?
subtitles.english: How was it? How was it?

subtitles.original: This is what you heard...
subtitles.english: This is what you heard...

subtitles.original: タッタッタッタッ、狂宴！
subtitles.english: Ta-ta-ta-ta, FEAST!

subtitles.original: Oh my god, that's crazy.
subtitles.english: Oh my god, that's crazy.

subtitles.original: I know, it's been a while.
subtitles.english: I know, it's been a while.

subtitles.original: I said I was going to go back to making music...
subtitles.english: I said I was going to go back to making music...

subtitles.original: ...and I kind of dabbled a little bit, you know.
subtitles.english: ...and I kind of dabbled a little bit, you know.

subtitles.original: Not anything too crazy, but I have a new single called FEAST, Kyoen!
subtitles.english: Not anything too crazy, but I have a new single called FEAST, Kyoen!

subtitles.original: It is produced by the amazing biz and ZERA-san.
subtitles.english: It is produced by the amazing biz and ZERA-san.

subtitles.original: bizとZERAさんの、あの、作ってくれた曲なんで、
subtitles.english: It's a song that biz and ZERA-san made for me, so

subtitles.original: Please have a listen! It's so vibey! It's so cool!
subtitles.english: Please have a listen! It's so vibey! It's so cool!

subtitles.original: Um, I want to be as cool as her.
subtitles.english: Um, I want to be as cool as her.

subtitles.original: Can I be as cool as her? Is like this?
subtitles.english: Can I be as cool as her? Is like this?

subtitles.original: *Gurgling* No, it doesn't work. Anyway!
subtitles.english: *Gurgling* No, it doesn't work. Anyway!

subtitles.original: Um, this is my new song and um, the MV is also coming out after the live!
subtitles.english: Um, this is my new song and um, the MV is also coming out after the live!

subtitles.original: So please check it out. The art is done by the master Daino, as always.
subtitles.english: So please check it out. The art is done by the master Daino, as always.

subtitles.original: Look at that! Look at that art!
subtitles.english: Look at that! Look at that art!

subtitles.original: あの、ライブ終わってね、MVも公開するので、ぜひ見ててください。
subtitles.english: Um, after the live, the MV will be released, so please check it out.

subtitles.original: 今回のアートもね、ダイノ先生が描いてくださったので、本当に
subtitles.english: The art this time was also drawn by Daino-sensei, so really

subtitles.original: すごいMVになったと思います。And...
subtitles.english: I think it's a great MV. And...

subtitles.original: ...um, I did the dance.
subtitles.english: ...um, I did the dance.

subtitles.original: It's kind of concerning when, you know,
subtitles.english: It's kind of concerning when, you know,

subtitles.original: your original song, you feel like the dance is not as hard as other ones that I did this time, but...
